messages.content:
1. (a) expand (x+2y)(2y-x)
    (b) hence, expand (a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^(2)+a^(2))
" (a) "{:[(x+2y)(2y-x)],[=2xy+x^(2)+4y^(2)-2xy],[=x^(2)+4y^(2)]:}
(b)
{:[(a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^(2)+a^(2))],[=(4b^(2)-a^(2))(4b^(2)+a^(2))],[=16b^(4)+a^(4)]:}

1. (a) expand \( (x+2y)(2y-x) \)
      \[ \begin{align*} &(x+2y)(2y-x)\\ &= 2y \cdot x - x \cdot x + 2y \cdot 2y - x \cdot 2y\\ &= 2xy - x^2 + 4y^2 - 2xy\\ &= x^2 + 4y^2 \end{align*} \]
    2. (b) hence, expand \( (a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^2+a^2) \)
      \[ \begin{align*} &(a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^2+a^2)\\ &= (4b^2 - a^2)(4b^2 + a^2)\\ &= 16b^4 + a^4 \end{align*} \]

1. (a) expand (x+2y)(2y-x)
    (b) hence, expand (a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^(2)+a^(2))
" (a) "{:[(x+2y)(2y-x)],[=2xy+x^(2)+4y^(2)-2xy],[=x^(2)+4y^(2)]:}
(b)
{:[(a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^(2)+a^(2))],[=(4b^(2)-a^(2))(4b^(2)+a^(2))],[=16b^(4)+a^(4)]:}

1. (a) Expand \( (x+2y)(2y-x) \): \[ \begin{align*} (x+2y)(2y-x) &= 2xy + x^2 + 4y^2 - 2xy \\ &= x^2 + 4y^2 \end{align*} \]
  2. (b) Hence, expand \( (a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^2+a^2) \): \[ \begin{align*} (a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^2+a^2) &= (4b^2-a^2)(4b^2+a^2) \\ &= 16b^4 + a^4 \end{align*} \]

check the solution following:
  1. (a) expand (x+2y)(2y-x)
    (b) hence, expand (a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^(2)+a^(2))
" (a) "{:[(x+2y)(2y-x)],[=2xy+x^(2)+4y^(2)-2xy],[=x^(2)+4y^(2)]:}
(b)
{:[(a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^(2)+a^(2))],[=(4b^(2)-a^(2))(4b^(2)+a^(2))],[=16b^(4)+a^(4)]:}

The solution is correct. Here is the breakdown of the steps:

(a) 
\[
\begin{aligned}
&(x+2y)(2y-x) \\
&= 2y \cdot x - x \cdot x + 2y \cdot 2y - x \cdot 2y \\
&= 2xy - x^2 + 4y^2 - 2xy \\
&= x^2 + 4y^2
\end{aligned}
\]

(b)
\[
\begin{aligned}
&(a+2b)(2b-a)(4b^2+a^2) \\
&= (4b^2 - a^2)(4b^2 + a^2) \\
&= 16b^4 + a^4
\end{aligned}
\]

Therefore, the solution provided for both parts (a) and (b) is accurate.
